Title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sci-Fi
Writer: John A. Davis (screenplay by), Steve Oedekerk (screenplay by), John A. Davis (story by), Steve Oedekerk (story by), David N. Weiss (screenplay), J. David Stem (screenplay), John A. Davis (based on the television series created by), Danelle Hand (story editor)
Actors: Megan Cavanagh, Mark DeCarlo, Debi Derryberry, Jeffrey Garcia
Plot: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.
